YAML front matter in posts

19/03/2017 #jekyll #dactl #howto

In order to use dactl’s post images with overlays you’ll need to learn how to set them. You do that in post’s YAML frontmatter and I’ll show you how.

YAML Front matter

Each Jekyll post starts with YAML Front 1. For example, this is how this post would look like if I wanted to use all of the options:

  1. Everything in between those two --- ↩

Post excerpts and leading paragraphs

17/03/2017 #dactl #howto

By default, dactl’s blog layout displays post excerpts which are leading paragraphs as well. This requires some manual work on your part when writing a post but don’t worry - it’s really easy. Read on for more info.
